column5: I just had a look and you can see the shadow starting to move over the moon. It's a beautiful clear sky this morning and if your into this sorta thing, it'll be a good show.
It's starting to get a little hazy here, but still viewable. Here's a pic I just got.
just got back from watching it with daughter who insisted I wake her.Had a great view but camera sucks so pics dont look very good.Was cool to watch though.
Watched it on the drive in today .Seemed to move fast until the last bit . Next one is in Feb TB

what was going on last night at 12:30 with the moon? we were supposed to see something strange happen (illusion of two moons) but i didnt see a thing, besides noticing that the moon was abnormally bright last night.
Well watched it till it disappeared, then the clouds must of rolled in, cause I never saw it again.
